com.rultor.ext.jira

Interface JiraIssue


  • @Immutable
public interface JiraIssue
    Jira issue.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assign(String name)
      Assign it to another user.
      Iterable<JiraComment> comments()
      Get its comments (in reverse order, latest first).
      String key()
      Its key.
      void post(String body)
      Post a comment.
      void revert(String message)
      Revert it back to the original owner before the latest change.

    • Method Detail

      • key

        String key()
        Its key.
        Returns:
        Key of the issue, e.g. TEST-1242

      • assign

        void assign(String name)
        Assign it to another user.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user to assign to

      • revert

        void revert(String message)
        Revert it back to the original owner before the latest change.
        Parameters:
        message - Error message to show

      • comments

        Iterable<JiraComment> comments()
        Get its comments (in reverse order, latest first).
        Returns:
        Comments

      • post

        void post(String body)
        Post a comment.
        Parameters:
        body - Body of it
